inputs.text: clean technical system architecture diagram, white background, modern flat infographic style, centered title 'BoramClaw Autonomous Agent', Korean labels, high readability, layered boxes and arrows. Layer 1: User Interface(CLI, Web UI, Telegram). Layer 2: Gateway + ReAct loop(Thought -> Action -> Observation). Layer 3: Tool Router + Dynamic Tool Loader(tools/*.py). Layer 4: Tool Sandbox(filesystem boundary, optional network policy). Side modules: Scheduler + Heartbeat, Watchdog 4-tier self-healing(KeepAlive, Watchdog, Guardian, Emergency LLM Recovery), Memory(short-term + vector long-term), Logs + Metrics + Audit. External services: arXiv, Gmail, Calendar, GitHub, On-chain wallet APIs. crisp typography, balanced spacing, precise arrows, no photorealism
blurry, noisy, low contrast, distorted text, illegible labels, clutter, watermark, logo artifacts, photorealistic people, messy background, dark background
